stories.Title: Goldman Sachs and Apple's unhappy union
stories.Description: American Express is reportedly stepping in to take over a part of Apple and Sachs' deal for the Apple Card, as challenges have plagued the credit card, resulting in significant losses.
stories.Tweet: Goldman Sachs and Apple's unhappy union 📦 American Express is reportedly stepping in to take over a part of Apple and Sachs' deal for the Apple Card, as challenges have plagued the credit card, resulting in significant losses. #apple https://www.imore.com/apple/apple-card-could-be-switching-banks-after-goldman-sachs-wants-out-has-it-failed

stories.Title: Exclusivity in Nothing
stories.Description: As we approach the launch of Nothing's Phone 2, the excitement continues to build, with CEO Carl Pei dropping hints about game-changing exclusive features between Nothing devices.
stories.Tweet: Exclusivity in Nothing 📦 As we approach the launch of Nothing's Phone 2, the excitement continues to build, with CEO Carl Pei dropping hints about game-changing exclusive features between Nothing devices. #nothing https://www.androidauthority.com/nothing-phone-exclusive-features-3341645/

stories.Title: AirPods get revamped
stories.Description: According to Mark Gurman, Apple is working on an innovative hearing test feature for AirPods. Combined with additional health sensors like body temperature monitoring, and a new USB-C case.
stories.Tweet: AirPods get revamped 📦 According to Mark Gurman, Apple is working on an innovative hearing test feature for AirPods. Combined with additional health sensors like body temperature monitoring, and a new USB-C case. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/07/02/usb-c-airpods-pro-coming-hearing-test/

stories.Title: A bitter end for the Ariane 5
stories.Description: On Tuesday evening, the last Ariane 5 rocket will soar into the skies, marking the end of an era in space exploration. However, uncertainty looms as Europe eagerly awaits the Ariane 6.
stories.Tweet: A bitter end for the Ariane 5 📦 On Tuesday evening, the last Ariane 5 rocket will soar into the skies, marking the end of an era in space exploration. However, uncertainty looms as Europe eagerly awaits the Ariane 6.  #rocketscience https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/europes-venerable-ariane-5-rocket-faces-a-bittersweet-ending-on-tuesday/

stories.Title: Blue Origin searches new horizons
stories.Description: The spaceflight company, owned by Jeff Bezos, is set to expand its presence to Europe and beyond. With plans for an international launch facility and other strategic acquisitions.
stories.Tweet: Blue Origin searches new horizons 📦 The spaceflight company, owned by Jeff Bezos, is set to expand its presence to Europe and beyond. With plans for an international launch facility and other strategic acquisitions. #blueorigin https://www.engadget.com/blue-origin-is-planning-to-open-new-launch-sites-outside-the-us-122518232.html

stories.Title: Humane’s approach to the future
stories.Description: The startup led by former Apple executives has caught our attention with the Ai Pin. Launching later this year, this visionary device will redefine the way we engage with technology.

stories.Title: Don't miss Tesla’s latest software update
stories.Description: Enjoy a bundle of new features including solar charging with Powerwall, a renewed Spotify experience, multiview cameras, improved navigation, and more.

stories.Title: Euclid’s next step
stories.Description: Euclid is gearing up for an extraordinary mission ahead. As it undergoes rigorous tests and calibrations, the stage is set for groundbreaking scientific observations of dark matter and dark energy.

stories.Title: Don't get caught by AI fatalism
stories.Description: The recent surge in artificial intelligence's popularity has sparked concerns about hypothetical risks, prompting AI researchers to emphasize the need for perspective.

stories.Title: Twitter's evolving landscape
stories.Description: The platform's latest moves include restricting access to combat AI-powered companies from stealing valuable user data, as well as temporary limits on daily tweet reading.
